QuestData.Title: Dishonored
QuestData.Description: Xandris the Dishonored was among the first to betray his brethren and accept the curse of Xavius.$B$BDuring the great war, it was he who led the slaughter of many of my dearest friends.$b$bThe last time I met him on the battlefield he fled. Help me to finally dispense justice on this foul being.
QuestData.RewardText: Xandris has finally paid for his crimes, but his blood will not bring back the innocents he has slain.
